summary: We testified about our recent report on sexual harassment at the Department of Veterans Affairs. VA has policies to prevent and address harassment, but some are inconsistent and incomplete. For example, the person who oversees personnel functions (e.g., hiring, promotions) is the same person who oversees the complaint process. This can create a conflict of interest. In addition, VA doesn't centrally collect information on all...
title: Sexual Harassment: VA Needs to Better Protect Employees
